id: Bloomberg's latest ad buy features personal appeal to voters
paragraph: By Cristina Alesci, CNNUpdated 9:01 PM ET, Sun November 4, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)Former New York Mayor Michael Bloomberg's political action committee is unleashing yet another advertisement—this one featuring himself, in a plea to voters on behalf of Democrats ahead of Tuesday's midterms.
